pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, June 7, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address and participate in a virtual conversation at the St. John’s Board of Trade’s Annual Outlook Conference, entitled “Outlook 2021: The Road To Recovery”. He will discuss the work ahead to rebuild a more resilient economy that leaves no one behind, including measures the federal government is taking to create good jobs and support businesses in Newfoundland and Labrador, and across the country. Minister of Natural Resources Seamus O’Regan Jr. will be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Media can register for the event by emailing aeid@bot.nf.ca.
  • Two reporters per media outlet are welcome to attend the conference free of charge.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
